Grid centroid calculation

Source: R/ENMcentroid.R
ENMcentroid.Rd

计算适生区栅格的质心. 栅格应为二元栅格, 即1代表适生区, 0代表非适生区.

Usage

ENMcentroid(
  radir,
  proname = F,
  format = "tif",
  outdir = NULL,
  parallel = F,
  ncpu = 2
)

Arguments

radir

栅格所在文件夹的路径, 可以是多个文件夹.

proname

逻辑值, 栅格所在文件夹的名称是否为投影时期名称. 如果为T, 则生成的数据框包含投影时期.

format

栅格格式

outdir

输出文件路径

parallel

是否并行

ncpu

并行时使用的cpu数

Value

数据框

Examples

df <- ENMcentroid(
  radir = "F:/sdm/maxent/32/1/p",
  proname = F,
  format = "tif",
  parallel = T,
  ncpu = 2
)
#> Error in ENMcentroid(radir = "F:/sdm/maxent/32/1/p", proname = F, format = "tif",     parallel = T, ncpu = 2): No grid file is found./n
df
